abstract.para: Use this procedure to add more &sbd; devices to a cluster that already has disk-based &sbd; configured. The cluster can have up to three &sbd; devices.

listitem.para: Disk-based &sbd; is already configured and running with at least one device.
An additional shared storage device is accessible from all cluster nodes.

topic.para: Perform this procedure on only one node in the cluster:

step.para: Log in either as the &rootuser; user or as a user with sudo privileges.
Check which device or devices are already configured for use with &sbd;:
The output shows one or more device IDs in the SBD_DEVICE line.
Add a new device to the existing &sbd; configuration:
The output should now show more devices.
Check the status of &sbd; to make sure all the nodes can see the new device:
